title: IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 05 Research Associate Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IIT Roorkee) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 05 Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2026 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address...
